title: Self-Management and Over-the-Counter Medication Education: Student-Produced Video Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of basic pharmacy and medical terminology
context.additional_context: An environment where pre-service teachers/teacher-role learners practice visually conveying self-management and non-prescription drug knowledge, maximizing learning outcomes through peer evaluation and expert feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can explain accurate information on 14 self-care and non-prescription medication topics with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can simplify complex medical concepts into videos tailored to the comprehension level of the target audience (general public).
Learners can revise their videos at least twice through peer and expert evaluations, improving the quality of the final output by over 90%.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
